properties.name: closable
properties.description: This flag will make tab closable.

tabproperties.name: active
tabproperties.description: Set true for specific tab open as default tab.

tabproperties.name: icon
tabproperties.description: Supports glyphicon only. Can add directly home instead of 'glyphicon glyphicon-home.

events.name: onClick
events.description: Callback to invoke on activated tab event.
